channel.title: Charliecraft Survival Server
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt]Charliecraft PvE[/size][/b][/center]
A friendly server with many features and a great community.
[center][color=black][size=24pt]Visit www.charliecraft.com to get started![/size][/color][/center]
[size=18pt]Plugins and Features:[/size] [size=14pt][b]Towny Plugin -[/b]
[ul][li]Free player-created towns Many nations to join, or create your own! Easy protection for buildings and creations Community building, supportive environments[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Magic Wands[/b]
[ul][li]Optional feature Use blaze rods, books and sticks to cast spells upon your foes Use powerful spells to reign against mobs[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Trade Signs and Currency[/b]
[ul][li]Use the currency (Charlie Cash) to trade with players or buy blocks from the spawn shop Trade slimeballs to earn cash (slimeballs are dropped at random from doing activities such as mining, logging or battling mobs) Trade your own items to earn more cash[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Live Map[/b]
[ul][li]See the whole world from the sky, in real time! View the global chat channel and see current player positions See the current in-game time[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Lockette[/b]
[ul][li]Protect your belongings using lockette signs, simply right click and chest, furnace, gate door or any other protectable item with a sign Allow other players access by adding their name to the sign Protect any chests outside of towns without worrying about thieves[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]World Portals[/b]
[ul][li]Choose to live in either the large-biome map generated in the 1.3 update, or the older 1.2.5 map Visit players in any world at any time Special members are allowed access to the 1.0 map[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Teleports[/b]
[ul][li]Teleport to any player, at any time using the /tpa command Bring any player to you using the /tpahere command[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Mob Tower Fight[/b]
[ul][li]Battle mobs in the convenience of a building Earn rewards for completing the fight multiple times[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Insult Button[/b]
[ul][li]Press a fun button at spawn for a random insult Have a random chance of getting a cool prize[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Player Rankings[/b]
[ul][li]Start on the server as a guest, and upgrade to member after signing up at www.charliecraft.com Work your way up to other ranks, such as loyal and CCveteran Donate to earn titles like iron, gold, diamond and VIP[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Anti-Grief[/b]
[ul][li]Build in comfort and security All blocks destroyed are logged so the culprit can be found within seconds Any grief will be rolled back and major perpetrators will be banned to prevent future incidents[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b]Anti-Cheat[/b]
[ul][li]Anti x-ray mechanisms included in the server to prevent cheaters and dishonest people[/li] [li][/li][/ul] [/size] [size=18pt]Forums[/size]
[ul][li][size=14pt]Post discussions, issues, suggestions, screenshots or anything on the Charliecraft forums Many regular readers with great opinions who will add to any topics Play a forum game with the other members Show creations and advertise towns to show what you can do[/size][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[size=18pt]Other Features[/size]
[ul][li][size=14pt]Great community Great moderators who will help with any problems Many players always happy to help out Surprise competitions Many events and item drops[/size][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[size=24pt][center]Get Started: IP: mc.charliecraft.com or visit www.charliecraft.com to sign up now![/center][/size]

item.title: Charliecraft Survival Server
item.dc:creator: @ralal500 ralal500
item.description:
@ralal500 wrote:

Some updates have been added to the server: All the plugins now use pretty colours :3 Much better than the boring old grey! There are also some nice perks for Gold +

Read full topic

item.title: Charliecraft Survival Server
item.dc:creator: @ralal500 ralal500
item.description:
@ralal500 wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Charliecraft PvE[/size][/center]

A friendly server with many features and a great community.

[center][color=black][size=24pt]Visit www.charliecraft.com to get started![/size][/color][/center]

[size=18pt]Plugins and Features:[/size]
[size=14pt]Towny Plugin -

[ul][li]Free player-created towns
Many nations to join, or create your own!
Easy protection for buildings and creations
Community building, supportive environments[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Magic Wands

[ul][li]Optional feature
Use blaze rods, books and sticks to cast spells upon your foes
Use powerful spells to reign against mobs[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Trade Signs and Currency

[ul][li]Use the currency (Charlie Cash) to trade with players or buy blocks from the spawn shop
Trade slimeballs to earn cash (slimeballs are dropped at random from doing activities such as mining, logging or battling mobs)
Trade your own items to earn more cash[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Live Map

[ul][li]See the whole world from the sky, in real time!
View the global chat channel and see current player positions
See the current in-game time[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Lockette

[ul][li]Protect your belongings using lockette signs, simply right click and chest, furnace, gate door or any other protectable item with a sign
Allow other players access by adding their name to the sign
Protect any chests outside of towns without worrying about thieves[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

World Portals

[ul][li]Choose to live in either the large-biome map generated in the 1.3 update, or the older 1.2.5 map
Visit players in any world at any time
Special members are allowed access to the 1.0 map[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Teleports

[ul][li]Teleport to any player, at any time using the /tpa command
Bring any player to you using the /tpahere command[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Mob Tower Fight

[ul][li]Battle mobs in the convenience of a building
Earn rewards for completing the fight multiple times[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Insult Button

[ul][li]Press a fun button at spawn for a random insult
Have a random chance of getting a cool prize[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Player Rankings

[ul][li]Start on the server as a guest, and upgrade to member after signing up at www.charliecraft.com
Work your way up to other ranks, such as loyal and CCveteran
Donate to earn titles like iron, gold, diamond and VIP[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Anti-Grief

[ul][li]Build in comfort and security
All blocks destroyed are logged so the culprit can be found within seconds
Any grief will be rolled back and major perpetrators will be banned to prevent future incidents[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Anti-Cheat

[ul][li]Anti x-ray mechanisms included in the server to prevent cheaters and dishonest people[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]
[/size]
[size=18pt]Forums[/size]

[ul][li][size=14pt]Post discussions, issues, suggestions, screenshots or anything on the Charliecraft forums
Many regular readers with great opinions who will add to any topics
Play a forum game with the other members
Show creations and advertise towns to show what you can do[/size][/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]Other Features[/size]

[ul][li][size=14pt]Great community
Great moderators who will help with any problems
Many players always happy to help out
Surprise competitions
Many events and item drops[/size][/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

[size=24pt][center]Get Started:
IP: mc.charliecraft.com
or visit www.charliecraft.com to sign up now![/center][/size]
